channel.title: Upick FM - Go insane (Town, eevee and Unknown win)
channel.description:
## Welcome to Upick FM
### Timer too lazy lol
### Rules Standard Forum Rules. No being an arse, cheating, spamming etc. Days will last 72 Hours. Nights will last 36 hours. Extensions will not be granted for forgetting to send an action. Voting is compulsive and plurality based! Majority is in effect! To vote someone up, you simply type **/vote playername (bolding it is nice too.)** When the majority of the group has voted for someone, they will be immediately sacrificed! Roles ARE revealed upon death
On join, you will message me your role's name. The last role name I get is what I will use.
### Gameplay Days will be 72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 48 hours long Actions are done by messaging me Mafia will talk through DMs When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone has enough votes, they will be lynched. Executions end the Day
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you >*depends on the ability* ;)
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: **[color=red]Mafia[/color]** **[color=red]Mafia[/color]** **[color=red]Mafia[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=green]Town[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral[/color]** **[color=steelblue]Random[/color]**
Living Players: 1. **Damafaud** 6. **3DT_CheesyKnives** 7. **Simon** 9. **Lymphoma** 10. **NozBugz** 11. **Insanity** 13. **Wolfy** 15. **PokemonKidRyan** 17. **eevee**
### Timestamps: [Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/upick-fm-go-insane-day-1/51835/192?u=pug) [Lynching of Unknown](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/upick-fm-go-insane-night-1-role-enabler-wins/51835/678?u=pug) [Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/upick-fm-go-insane-night-1/51835/693?u=pug) [Lynching of Celeste](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/upick-fm-go-insane-night-2/51835/1109?u=pug) [Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/upick-fm-go-insane-night-2/51835/1117?u=pug) [Lynching of Nerbins](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/upick-fm-go-insane-day-3/51835/1451?u=pug)
### Graveyard: Unknown - Lynched Day 1. **[color=steelblue]The Role Enabler[/color]** Sketch - Killed Night 1. **[color=green]The Astronaut[/color]** Celeste_Ludenberg - Lynched Day 2. **[color=green]The Goddess[/color]** NuclearBurrito - Killed Night 2. **[color=green]The Ultimate Detective[/color]** CaptainNerbins - Lynched Day 3. **[color=red]The Jerrynator[/color]** Marluxion - Killed Night 3. **[color=green]The Phantom Thief[/color]** Sam17z - Lynched Day 4. **[color=red]The Investor[/color]** Frostwolf103 - Killed Night 4 **[color=darkslategray]The Drainer[/color]**
